Connect Care needs access to your camera to take photos and videos for healthcare consultations.
Connect Care needs access to your microphone for voice calls and video consultations.
Connect Care needs access to your photo library to upload images for healthcare documentation.
Connect Care needs access to save photos to your library.
Connect Care needs your location to find nearby healthcare providers and services.
Connect Care needs your location to provide location-based healthcare services.
Connect Care needs your location to provide location-based healthcare services.
Connect Care may use Bluetooth to connect with medical devices.
Connect Care may use Bluetooth to connect with medical devices.
Connect Care needs access to your calendar to schedule appointments.
Connect Care needs access to reminders for appointment notifications.
Connect Care needs access to contacts to share information with your healthcare providers.
Connect Care may use motion data for health tracking features.
Connect Care may use speech recognition for voice commands.
Connect Care uses Face ID for secure authentication.
